title: Rationality Rules Guilty of Unwittingly Smuggling Jesus Morality
description:
Rationality rules is still complaining about Jordan Peterson. Why? At least he's being fair, recognizing that Jordan is very careful about his speech. His crime? Not joining the religious/moral bandwagon. What he doesn't realize is that Jesus go smuggled long ago and he echos centuries of Christian preachers complaining about Christian insufficiency in living out Jesus' love ethic. 

This is a short version. The long version contains the majority of the good faith conversation I had with Vaush where we explore some aspects of this ethic. 

Is Jordan Peterson Smuggling Jesus? https://youtu.be/on0Lziov00Y
Richard Dawkins on Unbelievable https://youtu.be/p5_0Fx_RICI
Jordan Peterson at Lafayette College https://youtu.be/V32WHDuy-Do
CS Lewis the Abolition of Man https://amzn.to/37yTCqn
Christian Smith Soul Searching https://amzn.to/3bJYTyH
The Political Captivity of the Faithful https://www.cardus.ca/comment/article/the-political-captivity-of-the-faithful/
Durability of Secular Humanism #1 https://youtu.be/3JLcoykfcNo
Durability of Secular Humanism #2 https://youtu.be/7VJWRE8n3C0
Can Atheism Save? https://youtu.be/RddIXMZQi3o
John Gray Humanism and Morality https://youtu.be/vkVau46LsHE
Tom Holland Delingpod https://youtu.be/R8J2aChrf7Q
Tom Holland Glen Scrivener https://youtu.be/a0xCs2EfiXA
Glen Scrivener Matt Dillahunty https://youtu.be/B3-sjyDYO2I
The Ideas of Rene Girard https://amzn.to/37y6eho
Modern Debates Has Jordan Peterson Hurt more than Helped https://youtu.be/LAUgExXyez4
On Vaush's channel https://youtu.be/BnTDNC3U7N0
